Type.BattleDialog: I don’t want to lose my loved ones again.
I steeled my resolve this time, I will secure the books of Mars and Lulu at all costs…
I just have to do this the usual way…
About Mars and Lulu… I don’t wanna blame you guys for their death.
You carried out your responsibilities, and I fulfilled mine.
Lulu, Mars… And Julia, who trusted me and followed me here… I’m sorry.
Let’s be careful. I could get killed as well.
…Please give me a minute to mourn them, at least.
The situation seems grave, I’m not sure if there’s any hope for us.
I just found the right timing to advance, that’s all.
I suppose… this is no time to be saying sorry.
I should put away personal sentiments in moments like this.
Mars and Lulu… Are you the one who killed them?
…Fair point. You simply do your job, and I carry out my own.
Julia… What will I have left now…?
I’ll act with composure.
I hope that nothing bad happens to us… I hope that all of us can leave this place safely.
This is a fight I can’t avoid, so I wanna win for the sake of everyone.
I’m all ready for this.
We do what we can… with maximum effort.
We did it… We’ve actually won, right? Now we can go back safe and sound.
Yeah, let’s tell Isadora all about this adventure we just had.
San… I’m sorry. I couldn’t help you much.
My legs are shaking… Are we at our limits?
I gotta pull myself together… for the sake of my late colleague.
…It won’t hurt to be sad just for a bit, maybe.
It’s just something that always happens. I shouldn’t get too sad about it.
I can do it if I try!
This is sad, but I guess there’s no choice…
San!!! No… Please don’t die on me like this…
We’re nothing like the ones that came here before us. It won’t be as easy.
Ensure that you never put down your own shields. And ensure that you never let others put your shields down.
We are not fighting as a joke.
This is what happens when a measly Urban Legend dares to challenge the Zwei Association: an obvious defeat.
This was the obvious outcome. I will make good use of the books you gave us.
Perhaps I underestimated my opponents…
I was certain that I would succeed…
This is a common occurence.
How unfortunate. But someone’s got to live.
What a waste of time. You shouldn’t have been a hindrance.
This is how you do it; take out your opponents one by one.
That wasn’t difficult at all to handle.
You’re a disorderly group of weaklings, aren’t you?
…You must be one of the clique that took San and Julia.
They don’t really look tough, but they did annihilate the previous group…
I’m not willing to forgive you at all.
We’ve won… San, Julia, I avenged you.
…I’m partially responsible for your deaths, so let’s say that we evened up the score with this.
Dammit… I’m still not done with my revenge…!
Please, just give me just another chance…
I should do my job, whether anyone else dies here or not.
…I’m still not fully accustomed to this.
We have a man down! We need… assistance.
Director, I’ve dealt with a hostile on my end.
Think of this as the rightful retribution for all the killing you’ve done.
You should’ve blocked the attacks better.
